venue.name: The Amherst College Museum of Natural History

item.description:
Jay, one of our meetup members is organizing this meetup on Saturday, March 24th.


The Amherst College Museum of Natural History.

Admission is free (I'm thinking they might ask for a donation)

Saturday March 24, at 12 noon - at main entrance

It is in a very convenient location and they say you can walk to it from downtown Amherst.


The Amherst College Museum of Natural History
Routes 9 and 116
Amherst, MA 01002

Tel - (413) 542-2165


** I have posted more information, including a map you can download under the FILES tab. **
